titleStmt.title: A learned treatise of the plague wherein the two questions, whether the plague be infectious or no, and , whether and how farr it may be shunned of Christians by going aside, are resolved / written in Latine by the famous Theodore Beza Vezelian.
titleStmt.author: Bèze, Théodore de, 1519-1605.
